author: BionicMarz
title: A Great Freebie Grab Bag!
review:
I was lucky enough to receive one of these promotional baggies during the Bricktober 2012 event.  There's nothing to complain about, especially since the set was free.

     Inside the polybag are these LEGO parts: A large cobweb, a bat, a glow-in-the-dark spider, a trans. red diamond, a dark trans. green crystal, and a buildable skeleton with a fairly detailed face.  A pack of stickers is also included.

     While you can't make up a story or scenery with just this small bag of parts, each and every piece is a great addition to anyone's LEGO collection.
